name: Lucky Block Race
short_description: Race with your friends in the fun-packed Lucky Block Race! The rules are simple; if you're the luckiest, then you're our winner!
long_description:
The classic we all love is here and is better than ever! Race with your friends in the fun-packed Lucky Block Race! The rules are simple; if you're the luckiest, then you're our winner!

+ Perfect minigame for a large group of friends!
+ Fully voice acted for the best immersion!
+ Custom mobs and sounds!
+ 16 free skins!

name: The Undying System
short_description: The company Brian works at decided to make some major changes which somehow led to him being an immortal imprisoned in The Undying System. Can you escape? Only the smart ones do!
long_description:
Oh no... What have you done NOW Brian?!
Welcome prisoner! The company Brian works at decided to make some major changes which somehow led to him being an immortal imprisoned in The Undying System. Can you escape? Only the smart ones do!

+ A prison break adventure
+ A great map for singleplayer & multiplayer!
+ Custom mobs and sounds!
+ 4 free skins!

name: Days at Frostville
short_description: Stories of mystery hide in a once abandoned Frostville. The Shadow Prince rises, and it's time for him to feast. Discover the many secrets and stop evil from entering the village.
long_description:
Stories of mystery hide in a once abandoned Frostville. The Shadow Prince rises, and it's time for him to feast. Discover the many secrets and stop evil from entering the village.


+ A story-driven adventure map!
+ Custom characters and sounds!
+ A boss fight unlike any other!
+ Great for singleplayer & multiplayer!

name: The Forgotten Palace
short_description: A forgotten palace in a forest stands tall. Once entered one's sure in for a brawl. Beasts await you big and small. Are you the one to end it once and for all?
long_description:
A forgotten palace in a forest stands tall.
Once entered one's sure in for a brawl.
Beasts await you big and small.
Are you the one to end it once and for all?

+ Solve the palace's many puzzles and secrets!
+ A challenging boss fight!
+ Mysteries waiting to be uncovered!

name: UHC Walls
short_description: Fight against your friends in the iconic UHC Walls! A customizable PvP minigame with unique and fun modes!
long_description:
Fight against your friends in the iconic UHC Walls! A customizable PvP minigame with unique and fun modes!

+ Perks: Including Golden Creepers, Lucky & Unlucky Creepers!
+ Hearts: A Bedwars like game mode! Protect your heart to live!
+ Four playable arenas!
+ Playable in single-player & multiplayer!
+ Includes 6 skins!

name: Lucky Creepers
short_description: Creepers are creepy, but LUCKY Creepers? How fun! Test your luck with nine Lucky Creepers, and over +250 drops! Build your world, or destroy it!
long_description:
Creepers are creepy, but LUCKY Creepers? How fun! Test your luck with nine Lucky Creepers, and over +250 drops! Build your world, or destroy it!

+ 9 different variants, each with unique drops and items!
+ Drops include custom entities and fantastic structures!
+ A stunning island survival spawn!

name: Galaxy Skyblock
short_description: Skyblock, but in SPACE! Survive the Skyblock challenge and learn about the milky way galaxy in this fun survival world!
long_description:
Skyblock, but in SPACE! Survive the Skyblock challenge and learn about the milky way galaxy in this fun survival world!

+ A mysterious beast with a precious treasure!
+ Learn about our solar system!
+ Unique block textures!
+ A fast travel rocket!

name: Big Animals
short_description: The skyblock we all love is now GIGANTIC! A unique and stunning world is awaiting you!
long_description:
The skyblock we all love is now GIGANTIC! A unique and stunning world is awaiting you!

+ A giant skyblock world!
+ Loot-filled mobs and animals!
+ 9 cute skyblock skins!

name: Skydrops
short_description: Imagine if every item you'll ever need to survive in a skyblock world dropped from the sky. That's exactly the deal in Skydrops! Collect dropping items and survive in this stunning skyblock world!
long_description:
Imagine if every item you'll ever need to survive in a skyblock world dropped from the sky. That's exactly the deal in Skydrops! Collect dropping items and survive in this stunning skyblock world!

+ 9 islands with unique loot tables for every island!
+ 5 cute HD skins!

name: The Colossus (Remastered)
short_description: The town's food has been disappearing. People thought the town was cursed, but you've seen things they didn't believe. Meet the gnomes and help them defeat Ronald.
long_description:
The town's food has been disappearing. People thought the town was cursed, but you've seen things they didn't believe. Meet the gnomes and help them defeat Ronald.

+ A story-driven adventure!
+ A complete remake of the 2017 classic!
+ An unforgettable boss fight!
+ Great in singleplayer & multiplayer!

name: Parachutes
short_description: Ever dreamed of having a parachute in Minecraft? Now you can have 14 of 'em! Explore this stunning survival spawn and find all 14 parachutes!
long_description:
Ever dreamed of having a parachute in Minecraft? Now you can have 14 of 'em! Explore this stunning survival spawn and find all 14 parachutes!

+ Unique designs and particles for all 14 parachutes!
+ A stunning survival spawn!

name: LUCKY BLOCKS!
short_description: YOU KNOW IT, YOU LOVE IT, IT'S LUCKY BLOCKS!
long_description:
YOU KNOW IT, YOU LOVE IT, IT'S LUCKY BLOCKS!

+ 9 different types of lucky blocks!
+ Over 250+ drops!
+ A stunning lucky block arena!

name: More Ores
short_description: Deep down in the mines, a plethora of ores are waiting to be dug. Collect the required ores to fix the Mining Drill and make mining a breeze!
long_description: Deep down in the mines, a plethora of ores are waiting to be dug. Collect the required ores to fix the Mining Drill and make mining a breeze! With these special ores come unique powers; you will never have to eat again with Vectrite! Pobryx, with its' healing properties, will make you fight monsters with ease! Get your friends in and have lots of fun with the Mining Drill!

name: Dimensions
short_description: Explore three custom dimensions, solve puzzles and kill monsters. Visit the Ruby, Swamp, and Crystal dimensions now!
long_description: Explore three custom dimensions, solve puzzles and kill monsters. Visit the Ruby, Swamp, and Crystal dimensions now! Features custom music, custom mobs, and custom blocks.

name: LASERS
short_description: Get lasers from point A to point B. Sounds easy, but it's surprisingly difficult!
long_description: Get lasers from point A to point B. Sounds easy, but it's surprisingly difficult! Solve challenging puzzles in a laser labyrinth. Put your brain to the test with 40 levels of LASERS now!

name: Tree Ores
short_description: Ever heard the expression "money doesn't grow on trees"? Well, what if it did!
long_description: Ever heard the expression "money doesn't grow on trees"? Well, what if it did! Grow your very own diamond tree with Tree Ores, and increase your ore supply by farming instead of mining!
